tags: Musical Instruments and parts and accessories
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Project Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of musical instruments to the Department of National Defence (DND).

### Tender Information
* **Reference Number**: WS4121377547
* **Publication Date**: October 4, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 24, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* **Contract Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Tender Description
The Contract is for the supply and delivery of 13 different musical instruments to the Department of National Defence, as described in the Annex Statement of Requirement. The Offeror must demonstrate their ability to provide the necessary items and must specify the make and model of each instrument as part of their bid.

### Evaluation Criteria
* Compliancy with the requirements of the solicitation of offers
* Meeting all mandatory technical evaluation criteria
* Compliance with the requirements of the solicitation of offers
* The Offeror must demonstrate that they are able to provide the items listed in Annex - Statement of Requirement
* Evaluation of the Offeror's bid on a lowest price basis

### Additional Information
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User: Department of National Defence (DND)
* Contact Information: Tony Fong (SPAC/PSPC) - tony.fong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Tender Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17626176?extsite=MTc2MjYxNzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Critical Details
* It is critical that all required supporting documentation and bid submissions be made by November 24, 2023, at 14:00 EST. Any bids submitted after this time will result in that bid being declared non-responsive.

By rewriting the provided entry as requested, we provide a clear, concise, and easy-to-follow tender announcement that captures the necessary information for government contractors and bidders.
